description:
A beautiful four bedroom detached villa with private pool and gardens situated in the tranquil area of Hisaronu, just a short drive from the beach.  

Ground Floor:

On entering the property there is a wide hall way with a quality wooden side unit leading to a very spacious living room and dining area with a large corner sofa and dining table and chairs. From the dining area there are patio doors that lead out to the 7x5m private pool. The kitchen is separate with marble work surfaces and wooden units. From the kitchen is a balcony which looks over the garden where there is a beautiful gazebo surrounded by fruit trees. An ideal place to enjoy breakfast!

Also on the ground floor is one of the double bedrooms with two single beds, a bedside cabinet and matching wardrobe and drawers. A good sized bathroom can also be found on this floor.

First Floor:

Marble stairs lead up to the first floor and two double bedrooms, both with double beds and matching bedroom furniture. The master bedroom has a very large en suite with separate bath and shower. Also on this floor is a large sun terrace, perfect for sunbathing or entertaining.

Second Floor:

Wooden stairs take you to a fourth double bedroom with twin beds and its own balcony.

Additional Information:

This is a superb property being sold fully furnished. There is LPG gas water heating and air conditioning units. The property has private parking and a private garden with apricot, plum, apple, orange, peach and lemon trees.

description:
This elevated 1/2 acre site boasts breathtaking views towards Symi and Rhodes. Situated only 150 meters from the sea shore, it is tranquil and in close proximity to a French multimillionaire’s exquisite private resort, whose presence has been influencing developments in the Bay of Sogut,
where property values are above average. Sogut lies on the Blue Cruise Turkish Riviera route. Its yacht club with superb restaurant is nearby and is popular among sailors and tourists. A consultation with a renowned architect states that planning permission for a villa of up to 400 m²
(4305,564 ft²) with 2-stories (800 m² in total) plus adjoining buildings, pool and terrace should be possible. The construction of a boutique hotel holds even greater potential subject to planning permission. The site's panoramic view will remain unhindered.

It's a two floor building and entrance level size 57m2.  Still working as Lebi Derya Restaurant the building also comprises a beatiful terrace. Since it's really rare chance to buy a building in the Yatch Marine it might be a really smart investment.
